item.title: Beyond Black Mesa Teaser
item.dc:creator: Stuntz
item.description:
Either they need to change the main character, or they change the actor. Because a HECU would not look like a 19 year old college kid. And that is a FACT. Especially since he was specially trained for the HECU. He would be buffed up a bit, but certainly not that skinny, its not the Air Force that Shepard is in… hes in the god damn Marines! The best of the best. Atleast of what I remember, if hes in the Army well… hes still atleast would be more buff…

Read full topic

item.title: Beyond Black Mesa Teaser
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
This looks like a fan made movie of escape from city 17 tbh. They didn’t try very hard to find a setting that looked even remotely city 17ish, but I suppose they figured they could cover all that up with explosions afterward anyway. The acting is sub par, even for a fan trailer, and having that guy play adrian shepard is just… very unfitting.

I didn’t like. It just looks like a couple of guys trying to ninja a piece of EFC17 pie.

Read full topic

item.title: Beyond Black Mesa Teaser
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
mechaelite:

End of opfor: you are trapped by the G-man, how the f*clk will they make him come back to earth? I don’t think they have any actor wich is so old to make of G-man and if they don’t have any1 to make of G-man how can Shephard be in the earth instead of trapped by G-man? But of course, they will surelly think something to fix it. Maybe they will continue the history of 1 of the 2 ends of a half-life mod… I think it was called sweet half-life, in the after-credits scene alternative final 1, shephard gets rescued heh.

my previous “what?” was meant to imply that your post made no sense at all, I did not require an explanation

item.title: Beyond Black Mesa Teaser
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
Trailer was extremely boring and not at all half-life like. Nothing but running. No cool fight scenes, not even any cool acrobatic tricks. The actor doesn’t at all fit Adrian’s character. He’s a tough skilled soldier trying to survive, not some weak college student.

IMO a good half-life movie would be a digital one made to look similar either to blackmesa (the game) or Half-Life 2. The live action really ruins the feel of the half-life series. And since the makers are on such a tight budget the environments don’t look at all good or anything like the environments from the game.

Read full topic
